post.text: We don't have time to play games anymore! Enough! It is time to MAKE AMERICA SAFE & GREAT AGAIN -- IMMEDIATELY! -DJT

comment.author: Kaleb-Michael
comment.text: I hope to god Trump becomes president , did anyone notice there isn't one American flag flying at the DNC convention ????? Hello ..how disgusting is that? Michelle Obama stood on a stage of a DNC convention for president without the flag anywhere ????? Sick... She should of demanded it .. Hillary Clinton hates America just like the Obamas do .. Vote Trump

replies.author: Sooren
replies.text: Well you know she doesn't want to offend anyone with our flag *wink wink*
